attributes.action: Increased street lighting and CCTV in East Finchley Fortis Green Muswell Hill
attributes.additional_details: In December, the figures show there has been a rise in street robbery in East Finchley of +14 offences in the period Oct-Dec compared to 2016. ABH and GBH are fairly consistent and consist mainly of DV matters and isolated incidents. Fortis Green has also experienced an increase in street robbery of +19 offences and is an ongoing issue.
attributes.background:
There has been a rise in street robbery in East Finchley, Fortis Green and Muswell Hill. 
As there has been a significant reduction in  policing, and the local police stations have now closed we would at least like to have better street lighting and much more CCTV in the area.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local street lighting and CCTV are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
